course.subject: CORE
course.name: Academic English for University Studies
course.description: This course emphasises the development of academic literacy skills, in addition to developing students’ language proficiency.Students will learn how to find and evaluate sources for academic tasks and will further develop their abilities to be critical in reading and writing, to synthesise ideas and to develop coherent arguments. Collaboration and leadership skills will also be emphasised to further develop skills and habits for autonomous lifelong learning.
course.prerequisites: CORE 1401 OR CORE 1402 OR Level 5 in HKDSE English Language with all papers at or above level 4 OR Overall bandscore of 6.5 in IELTS with all subscores at or above 6.0 OR equivalence of the above

reviews.author: hanyi
reviews.comment_content:
Unit 1- Professionalism: team skills and research skills
*   Content: This helps develop skills that will be useful for the rest of the course and your future studies.
*   Format: twice a week f2fd
Unit 2- Academic literacy skills for university study
• Content: Writing a summary and critique; finding, evaluating, synthesizing and citing sources; producing coherent arguments; and helping the audience follow and engage with your ideas.
.
Assessment: Submit 1 main assessment: W2 (individual writing)
.
Format: A combination of f2f lessons and self-directed lessons. The self-directed lessons involve SDL activities at home instead of attending f2f class.
•You also work on your first SDL elective in your own time through this unit.
Unit 3- Oral and multimodal communication
*  
*  
.
Content: Communicating coherently and effectively in an informative and engaging way for your audience.
Assessment: Submit 1 main assessment: V2 (individual video)
Format: A combination of f2f lessons and self-directed lessons. The self-directed lessons involve SDL activities at home instead of attending f2f class.
You also work on your second SDL elective in your own time through this unit.
Explanation:
Project tasks (75%) = 1 writing (W2) + 1 individual video (V2) which make up your main course project.
SDL (25%) - small, regular online self-directed tasks throughout Unit 2 and 3 AND the Online Library Session to complete at home
Self-directed lessons = no regular f2f class. Instead, complete the online work in your own time at home

reviews.author: kykyw
reviews.comment_content:
主要係教你點樣落apa
跟住就冇咩嘢學到
reviews.comment_teaching:
好有心教嘅老師👍👍👍
guideline 真係好清晰
要求高但係會話俾你聽點樣攞高分
例如有sample睇
基本上做得好過sample唔會太爛grade
而且仲可以逢禮拜三book佢
我建議係點都係交之前見一見佢
佢會話比你聽有咩嘢重可以執
最好問清楚內容點樣可以寫好啲或者做好啲
reviews.comment_grading:
My grade: A-
佢有講過大概點樣比分
我冇記錯嘅話佢好似話cle 會每個grade搵一份做standard 然後叫instructor跟著改，然後如果嗰個instructor偏向係俾得鬆手嘅話，cle會將instructor改嘅所有grade全部乘返細嗰分
所以佢嘅意思係，靚唔靚grade都好睇cle 覺得instructor係鬆手嘅定係比較緊啲嘅而去做調節
